ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: If other people don't seem to accept me, I don't let it bother me
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I try hard not to do things that will make other people avoid or reject me
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I seldom worry about whether other people care about me
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I need to feel that there are people I can turn to in times of need
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I want other people to accept me
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I do not like being alone
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Being apart from my friends for long periods of time does not bother me
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I have a strong need to belong
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: It bothers me a great deal when I am not included in other people's plans
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My feelings are easily hurt when I feel that others do not accept me
Notes: 0 = Strongly disagree; 1 = Moderately disagree; 2 = Neither agree nor disagree; 3 = Moderately agree; 4 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Need To Belong Scale Total Score
I have a strong need to belong
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Somewhat Disagree; 4 = Neither agree nor disagree; 5 = Somewhat agree; 6 = Agree; 7 = Strongly agree
